channel.title: The Clairvoyant / The Seer
channel.description:
>**The Clairvoyant (Unique Blue Dragon Support)** Day Abilties Perceive (2 uses) If your chosen target is killed tonight, learned what killed them.
I know this is like a Physician's exhume, but it only works if their target dies the night the ability is used.
>Night Abilities Predict (Infinite uses) If your target dies tonight, you will prevent their death. Can only prevent one death. Paradox (2 uses) Cause a bleeding player to survive one more day. **Discover and defeat the Unseen / Cult and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.**
>**The Seer (Unique Unseen Offensive)** Night Abilities Time Lock (2 uses) All players on your target will be redirected to that same target tomorrow night. Does not affect redirection immunity. Time Reverse (2 uses) All players on your target will be redirected to their last target tomorrow night. Does not affect redirection immunity. **Convert or defeat the Blue Dragon faction and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.**

item.title: The Clairvoyant / The Seer
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
PeePeePaladin:

If your chosen target is killed tonight, learn who killed them.

Instant confimability + evil spotted

PeePeePaladin:

Learn if a player is reaped, bleeding, or has a delayed death. The result will be given at the end of the day.

Okay? Does a Support really need to see this?

PeePeePaladin:

If your target dies tonight or the next night, you will prevent their death. Can only prevent one death.

So a heal that lasts two nights?

PeePeePaladin:

Cure a delayed death.

Only useful if Chrono is ingame.

PeePeePaladin:

Offensive

The convert would be the same as original class.

PeePeePaladin:

Choose 2 targets. If your first target dies tonight, your second target will be framed to seem as if they visited your first target. Lasts until the Seer or the second target dies.

Oh god. Working with Assassin, you would literally be op

PeePeePaladin:

Learn if a player is reaped, bleeding, or has a delayed death. The result will be given at the end of the day.

Does an Offensive really need this?

PeePeePaladin:

All players on your target will be redirected to that same target tomorrow night.

Even If Redirect immune

PeePeePaladin:

If the Assassin’s target cannot be killed that night, they will not attack the target.
*Will also be used if the Assassin or their target is being followed by an Observer. If the Assassin uses 2 for 1, only the target that is not being followed / defended / healed will be attacked.

This reminds me of a ToL ability. In any case, offensive does not need this.
In fact, the Seer isn’t even an Offensive.
